name: Vignoble
uniques: If owner is France: Add [1] Loyalty to city
civilopediaText: Vineyard: gold + culture and small loyalty boost for France.

name: Chateau Royal
civilopediaText: Royal chateau that provides culture and tourism.

name: Camp Militaire
uniques: Add [1] XP to units trained in adjacent city
civilopediaText: Military camp: production and XP bonus.

name: Atelier Artistique
civilopediaText: Artist atelier: culture and tourism; increases chance of great artists.
